comments:
Abolished 1894 to become the separate parishes of Melksham Within 
    and Melksham Without. See also Table 2, note (e).

Created 30.9.1894 from the part of the parish of Melksham in Melksham 
    Urban District.

Created 30.9.1894 from the rural part of the parish of Melksham. 
    See also Table 2, note (e).

Created 30.9.1894 from the rural part of the parish of Trowbridge. 
    See also Table 2, note (e).
Abolished 1894 and added to the parish of Whaddon.

That part which until 1.4.1934 formed part of the parish of 
    Trowbridge. See also Table 2, note (e).
